message: Congratulations on considering my product! I'd like to highlight that I've had an impressive 80% success rate with my previous sales, with most customers being extremely satisfied with their purchases. This product is a rare opportunity to own a unique item, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your decision. Will you take the chance and make a statement with this exclusive product?
I'd like to know more about the product before making a decision. Can you tell me more about the product's features and any guarantees you offer?

I understand your hesitation, and I'm happy to provide more information. Unfortunately, I'm a bit limited in what I can share about this particular product, as it's a one-of-a-kind item. However, I can assure you that it's a genuine article, and I've had many satisfied customers in the past. As for guarantees, I'm confident in the product's quality, but I'm also a reasonable person. If you're not completely satisfied, I'm open to negotiating a fair return or exchange. Would you like to take a chance on this unique opportunity?

I'd like to pass on this product for now. I'd like to see some sales data before making a decision. How many potential buyers have been interested in the product so far, and what's the proportion of high-quality products you've had in the past?

I understand your cautious approach, and I'm happy to provide some sales data. So far, I've had 2 potential buyers interested in this product, and I've sold 16 products in total. Out of those 16, 13 were high-quality products, which is an impressive 81% success rate. As for this particular product, I can confidently say it's one of the high-quality ones. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, and I'm sure you'll be thrilled with your purchase. Would you like to take advantage of this rare opportunity?
I'd like to know more about the sales data. How many potential buyers have been interested in total, and how many products have been offered in total?
